title: The Book of Judges
description: All things work together for the good of those who believe. Too bad Maura Garrison, private investigator, isn't a believer. The murder she was hired to solve hinges on it's parallel in the the Old Testament book, Judges, but she was just dumped by her pastor-husband so the Bible is the last thing she wants to turn to for answers.
author: Traci Tyne Hilton
